content: flap set up round this will be your bor place a round 1 k to 2 sts before marker k2tog sm k marker if you wish k 18 20 22 pick up and 5 7 9 work next row of the strawberry k 14 16 18 sts along your heel flap break pattern across the front of sock k 16 18 20 contrast yarn and start working with main sm ssk k to end of round colour yarn here pick up 1 extra st in the ladder from the row below and k tbl pm k 17 round 2 k to m sm k 5 7 9 work next row 19 21 work row 1 of the strawberry of the strawberry pattern across the front of pattern k 4 6 8 pm pick up 1 extra st in the sock k 16 18 20 sm k to end of round ladder from the row below and k tbl pick up repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have and k 14 16 18 sts along your heel flap decreased down to your original stitch count round 1 k to 2 sts before marker k2tog sm k with 28 32 36 sts on the back of your sock 17 19 21 work next row of the strawberry k to m sm this is now your bor and you can pattern across the front of sock k 4 6 8 sm remove the other st markers as you work the ssk k to end of round next round round 2 k to m sm k 17 19 21 work next foot row of the strawberry pattern across the front of sock k 4 6 8 sm k to end of round continue working in established pattern until the foot measures 4 cm / 1 5 inches less than repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have desired foot length i recommend ending decreased down to your original stitch count having just worked row 8 or 16 of the with 28 32 36 sts on the back of your sock strawberry pattern k to m sm this is now your bor and you can if using contrast yarn for the toes break yarn remove the other st markers as you work the here and start working with your contrast next round colour now 3 strawberry cheesecake socks by debbie ford toe cut your working yarn leaving a tail of approximately 38 cm 15 inches now you the toes are worked in the same way for both can kitchener stitch your toe closed socks set up round k 28 32 36 pm k to end of round round 1 k1 ssk k to 2 sts before marker k2tog sm k1 ssk k to 2 sts before end of round k2tog 4 sts decreased round 2 k to end of round repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have 20 28 36 sts left -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- strawberry pattern written instructions row 1 p1 k tbl ×
